detectors.description:
Reentrancy in StakingTC.stake(uint256) (StakingTC.sol#206-219):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(token.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),amount_),Staking: Transfer fail!) (StakingTC.sol#212-214)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- s.amount = amount_ (StakingTC.sol#216)
	- s.claimedTime = block.timestamp (StakingTC.sol#217)
	- s.unlockTime = block.timestamp + minLockTime (StakingTC.sol#218)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [StakingTC.stake(uint256)](StakingTC.sol#L206-L219):
	External calls:
	- [require(bool,string)(token.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),amount_),Staking: Transfer fail!)](StakingTC.sol#L212-L214)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [s.amount = amount_](StakingTC.sol#L216)
	- [s.claimedTime = block.timestamp](StakingTC.sol#L217)
	- [s.unlockTime = block.timestamp + minLockTime](StakingTC.sol#L218)

detectors.description:

	State variables written after the call(s):

elements.name: require(bool,string)(s.unlockTime <= block.timestamp,Staking: Lock time not expired)

	- s.claimedTime + rewardRate >= block.timestamp (StakingTC.sol#262)
